trans-unit.source: Oracle software hosted on Azure virtual machines
trans-unit.target: Oracle software hosted on Azure virtual machines

trans-unit.source: Get to the key topics that describe how to set up Oracle software on Windows-based or Linux-based Azure virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: Get to the key topics that describe how to set up Oracle software on Windows-based or Linux-based Azure virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: Set up your first or next dev/test or production Oracle database running on a virtual machine in Azure infrastructure services.
trans-unit.target: Set up your first or next dev/test or production Oracle database running on a virtual machine in Azure infrastructure services.

trans-unit.source: Take advantage of ease of configuration and the ability to quickly expand the Oracle database workload to include new capacity.
trans-unit.target: Take advantage of ease of configuration and the ability to quickly expand the Oracle database workload to include new capacity.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>List of Oracle virtual machine images</linkText><title></title> for the latest set of Windows-based and Linux-based virtual machine images.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>List of Oracle virtual machine images</linkText><title></title> for the latest set of Windows-based and Linux-based virtual machine images.

trans-unit.source: See <linkText>Miscellaneous considerations for Oracle virtual machine images</linkText><title></title> to understand limitations for Oracle software on Windows Server-based Azure virtual machines.
trans-unit.target: See <linkText>Miscellaneous considerations for Oracle virtual machine images</linkText><title></title> to understand limitations for Oracle software on Windows Server-based Azure virtual machines.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Creating an Oracle database virtual machine in Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through virtual machine creation, database creation, and configuration of popular options.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Creating an Oracle database virtual machine in Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through virtual machine creation, database creation, and configuration of popular options.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c virtual machine in Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through the creation of an Azure virtual machine based on the Oracle WebLogic Server 12c image running on Windows Server 2012.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c virtual machine in Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through the creation of an Azure virtual machine based on the Oracle WebLogic Server 12c image running on Windows Server 2012.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through virtual machine and database creation and configuration.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c and Oracle Database 12c virtual machine in Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through virtual machine and database creation and configuration.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c cluster in Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through cluster creation and application deployment.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 12c cluster in Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through cluster creation and application deployment.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 11g virtual machine in Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through virtual machine creation, configuration, and application installation.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Creating an Oracle WebLogic Server 11g virtual machine in Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through virtual machine creation, configuration, and application installation.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Prepare an Oracle Linux virtual machine for Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through the prerequisites and virtual machine creation for Oracle Linux 6.4+ and Oracle Linux 7.0+.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Prepare an Oracle Linux virtual machine for Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through the prerequisites and virtual machine creation for Oracle Linux 6.4+ and Oracle Linux 7.0+.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configuring Oracle Data Guard for Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through configuration of the standby environment and the listener.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configuring Oracle Data Guard for Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through configuration of the standby environment and the listener.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Configuring Oracle GoldenGate for Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through database and replication setup.
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Configuring Oracle GoldenGate for Azure</linkText><title></title> steps you through database and replication setup.
